DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 1 , multicenter , open-label , single-arm dose-escalation dose-expansion study durvalumab combination IPH2201 evaluate safety , tolerability , PK , immunogenicity , pharmacodynamics , antitumor activity adult subject select advance solid tumor . The study consist 2 part : dose escalation dose expansion . Subjects receive durvalumab IPH2201 via 2 separate IV infusion . Subjects receive durvalumab IPH2201 unacceptable toxicity , documentation confirm progressive disease ( PD ) , documentation subject withdrawal another reason .
